uvi.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v4.4.276
uvi.description:
seq_file: disallow extremely large seq buffer allocations

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.4.276 by commit 3533e50cbee8ff086bfa04176ac42a01ee3db37d, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 058504edd02667eef8fac9be27ab3ea74332e9b4. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: seq_file: disallow extremely large seq buffer allocations
